sect2.title: Show hidden files or folders
sect2.para:
In Konqueror or Dolphin, use
View Show Hidden Files to toggle hidden files and folders.

sect2.title: Rename all files in a directory at once
sect2.para: Using the program Krename, it is possible to rename multiple files according to a naming scheme which you define.

step.para: Krename can be easily installed with the Adept Package Manager. Krename is located in the Universe repositories. Refer to the Adept Package Manager

Launch Krename by choosing K-menu->Utilities->Krename
KMenu Utilities Krename

sect2.title: Opening RAR files
sect2.para: Usually, most archive files can be opened by simply double clicking on the file. However, to handle rar files, follow the following steps.

step.para: Install the unrar package from the Multiverse repositories using the the Adept Package Manager. Refer to the Adept Package Manager
Double click to open the file.
